name: Overdrive Rush 2020
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Join a fast-paced competition in the dystopian, cyberpunk city of Oko. Hinder the opposing gang, repel the wild machines and control the battle area to dominate the game. Cooperate with your teammates to claim victory, and be the new champion of the Overdrive Rush!

Platform: PC
Engine: Unreal Engine 4
Number of players: 6

Producer: Antoine PICARD
Game Art: Hamza BELHOUSSINE DRISSI, Jean-Michel JEAN-MARIE, Basilio MOYA & Nicolas VONG
Game Design: Alexandre NESTOROV, Jean-Gabriel REGO-KIRK & Kevin SACHWALD-KAISER
Game Design & Programming: Jérémie POCHAT DE BERNARDO
Game Programming: Cyril CHATIN, Hannaé DELASSUS, Lucas FROGER, Jean LEFEVRE & Adrien MONTEIRO
Music & Sound Design: Valentin SEZEUR

https://twitter.com/overdriverush
Soundcloud: https://bit.ly/2Yn1xV6
